meanings.sent1: She is the whingiest person I know, always finding something to complain about.
meanings.sent2: The whingiest customer at the store never seems satisfied with anything.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked at her with a 'really?' expression at her whingiest moment.
meanings.sent4: Her whingiest attitude was like a dark cloud hanging over the group.
meanings.sent5: The whingiest sound of her voice echoed through the room, making everyone uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to complain or whine frequently
meanings.sent1: He becomes the whingiest whenever things don't go his way.
meanings.sent2: The whingiest student in class always has something to grumble about.
meanings.sent3: His whingiest behavior during the game made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The whingiest expression on his face revealed his dissatisfaction clearly.
meanings.sent5: The whingiest tone in his voice grated on everyone's nerves.
